edu.gvsu.cis.spacejourney.screens.backgrounds

Class ParallaxBackground

  • edu.gvsu.cis.spacejourney.screens.backgrounds.ParallaxBackground

  • public class ParallaxBackground

    Class that handles a parallax background given 2-3 layers.

      Class that handles a parallax background given 2-3 layers.

      • draw

        public void draw(NonExistentClass batch,
                 float parentAlpha)

        Draws the three parallax layers on to the screen.

        Parameters:
        batch - The sprite batch used in the game.
        parentAlpha - Alpha value of the entire object.

      • act

        public void act(float delta)

        Method that is constantly called to update the layers, instead of render.

        Parameters:
        delta - The time different between the last and current render() method calls.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()

        Method that disposes the textures used to compose the parallax layers.
